il.ac.hit.couponstorem.model

Interface ICouponDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CouponDao

    public interface ICouponDao
    The ICouponDao Interface specifies the method used for interacting with a Data Base . the Interface requires a Data Access Object Class that implements those methods. The methods in this class can get , add ,update or delete a row or a column value from the coupons table in the Data Base.
    Author:
    nadav

    • Method Detail

      • getCoupon

        Coupon getCoupon(int id)
                 throws MyException
        This method returns a Coupon object and store the properties in it from the query according to a given id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id is a unique identifier for the coupon object.
        Returns:
        a Coupon object .
        Throws:
        MyException - if the the Coupon object is null.

      • UpdateCoupon

        boolean UpdateCoupon(Coupon ob,
                   java.lang.String colname,
                   java.lang.String colval)
                     throws MyException
        This method update the Data Base coupons table according to a specific column and value. This method returns true if the update was successful .
        Parameters:
        ob - the ob is a Coupon class object
        colname - is a string that represent the name of the column in the data base.
        colval - is a string that represent the data retrieved according to the column name.
        Returns:
        a boolean variable queryFlage .
        Throws:
        MyException

        ob - the ob is a Coupon class object.
        Returns:
        a boolean variable queryFlage .
        Throws:
        MyException

        boolean deleteCoupon(int id)
        This method deletes coupon from the Data Base coupons table . This method returns true if the coupon was removed successfully .
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a boolean variable queryFlage .
        Throws:
        MyException

      • getCoupons

        java.util.Iterator<Coupon> getCoupons(int from,
                                    int numberOfCoupons,
                                    java.lang.String category)
                                      throws MyException
        This method gets a list of coupons from the Data Base coupons table according to start value and end value and category . This method returns true if the list was retrieved successful .
        Parameters:
        from - the from is an integer variable that represent the start id to retrieve data from .
        numberOfCoupons - the numberOfCoupons is an integer variable that represent the end id to retrieve data up to.
        category - the category is a string variable that represent the category of which a coupon belongs to.
        Returns:
        the list iterator.
        Throws:
        MyException

        numberOfCoupons - the numberOfCoupons is an integer variable that represent the end id to retrieve data up to.

        the list iterator
        Throws:

      • deleteCouponByBusiness

        boolean deleteCouponByBusiness(java.lang.String businessid)
                               throws MyException
        This method deletes a certain business from the database. This method remove every entry of the chosen business.
        Parameters:
        businessid - the businessid is the String that describe the business name.
        Returns:
        boolean value queryFlag.
        Throws:
        MyException
